text:
“Very soon,” he said. “Pyotr Petrovitch will decide the date.” 

Dounia beamed with excitement. 

“I’ll press you to my heart!” 

She joked about marrying Pyotr Petrovitch for that joy. 

“She has so much to tell you,” he wrote. “But no pen now.” 

He sent her love and kisses instead. 

“I might send you money soon,” he added. 

“Dounia’s engagement has improved my credit.” 

“I can borrow seventy-five roubles,” he thought. 

“Maybe twenty-five or thirty for you.” 

“Pyotr Petrovitch is covering our bags,” he reassured. 

“But we need to save for Petersburg.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia is excited about her upcoming marriage to Pyotr Petrovitch, and they are planning their journey to Petersburg while managing their finances.
